original_title: 2003 FIA Formula One World Championship Season Review
overview: The 2003 Formula One season promised to be great; it turned out one of the best for years! Classic on-track battles combined with off-track mind games, delivering an intensely competitive year of action and drama. And it all went down to the last race for a thrilling climax.
tagline: A review of the 2003 F1 season
title: 2003 FIA Formula One World Championship Season Review
